original_title: Me, My Brother and our Balls
overview: Me, My Brother and Our Balls is an intimate and personal documentary exploring male fertility with Love Island star Chris Hughes and his brother Ben. When Chris, who had suffered from testicular health scares in the past, appeared on live television to have a testicular examination, it made a huge impact.
tagline: 'Love Island' star Chris Hughes and his brother Ben investigate male fertility, and why it is not taken seriously enough.
title: Me, My Brother and Our Balls
